text: Ivan Kolev Vutsov (; 14 December 1939 â€“ 18 January 2019) was a Bulgarian football player and coach. He played for and later managed the Bulgarian national team. He played in three matches at the 1966 FIFA World Cup and for Levski Sofia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at LevskiSofia.info Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Bulgarian football managers
